## Mid-term projections {.tabset}

### Infection incidence {.tabset}

#### By region
```{r reg-medterm-inf, cache=TRUE, cache.extra=results_hash}
if (!exists("projections_file")) projections_file <- "projections.RData"
if (!exists("make.plots")) source(file.path(Rfile.loc, "plot_funcs.R"))
load(file.path(out.dir, projections_file))
make.plots(infections, by = "region", project.forwards = TRUE)
```

#### By age
```{r age-medterm-inf, cache=TRUE, cache.extra=results_hash}
make.plots(infections, by = "age", project.forwards = TRUE)
```
